component.name: Linwood Setonix
component.summary: Powerful, customizable, cross-platform, opensource table sandbox game

description.p: Setonix is a table sandbox game where you can decide how to play. Spawn cards everywhere you like, add optional rules and play with your friends or alone without internet.

ul.li: Play games with your friends or alone
No internet connection required to play, multiplayer also works offline
Configure if you want to play with or without rules
Create custom cards, board and dices
Pack them all into a package and share it with your friends
Load the rules in the server and the client
The app is available for android, windows, linux, and in the web. You can use it on your phone, tablet, or computer.
The app is open source and free. You can contribute to the project and help to make it better.
